casebody.data:
State
v.
Antwan Anthony 324A16-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. December 16, 2016
As Amended December 19, 2016 Kathryn L. VandenBerg, Attorney at Law, for Anthony, Antwan. Kimberly Robb, Assistant District Attorney, Robert C. Montgomery, Special Deputy Attorney General, Kimberly S. Robb, District Attorney, for State of N.C.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 16th of December 2016 by Defendant for Extension of Time to Prepare Trial Transcript:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 16th of December 2016."

Court reporter shall have up to and including the 20th day of January 2017 to prepare and deliver transcript to counsel.
